Uses of Package
org.springframework.instrument.classloading

Packages that use org.springframework.instrument.classloading
org.springframework.context.weaving Load-time weaving support for a Spring application context, building on Spring's LoadTimeWeaver abstraction. 
org.springframework.instrument.classloading Support package for load time weaving based on class loaders, as required by JPA providers (but not JPA-specific). 
org.springframework.instrument.classloading.glassfish Support for class instrumentation on GlassFish / Sun Application Server. 
org.springframework.instrument.classloading.oc4j Support for class instrumentation on Oracle OC4J. 
org.springframework.instrument.classloading.weblogic Support for class instrumentation on BEA WebLogic 10. 
org.springframework.orm.jpa Package providing integration of JPA (Java Persistence API) with Spring concepts. 
org.springframework.orm.jpa.persistenceunit Internal support for managing JPA persistence units. 
 

Classes in org.springframework.instrument.classloading used by org.springframework.context.weaving
LoadTimeWeaver
          Defines the contract for adding one or more ClassFileTransformers to a ClassLoader.
 

Classes in org.springframework.instrument.classloading used by org.springframework.instrument.classloading
LoadTimeWeaver
          Defines the contract for adding one or more ClassFileTransformers to a ClassLoader.
ResourceOverridingShadowingClassLoader
          Subclass of ShadowingClassLoader that overrides attempts to locate certain files.
ShadowingClassLoader
          ClassLoader decorator that shadows an enclosing ClassLoader, applying registered transformers to all affected classes.
SimpleInstrumentableClassLoader
          Simplistic implementation of an instrumentable ClassLoader.
 

Classes in org.springframework.instrument.classloading used by org.springframework.instrument.classloading.glassfish
LoadTimeWeaver
          Defines the contract for adding one or more ClassFileTransformers to a ClassLoader.

          Defines the contract for adding one or more ClassFileTransformers to a ClassLoader.
